entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
